14876 Stirrup Lane Wellington, FL, 33414.title: Martino Family Lightshow
14876 Stirrup Lane Wellington, FL, 33414.description:
The Martino Family Christmas Lights in Wellington Florida. Our family has been putting up our display for over 40 years here in South Florida starting down in Miramar in the early 70's. We have thousands of computerized lights as well as original displays that we have had in our family for generations.
If you are here in South Florida we invite you, your family and friends to stop by, say hello and enjoy our display as well as our neighbors displays.
Make sure to tag Martino Family Christmas Lights! 🎄
We are located in Paddock Park 1 at 14876 Stirrup Lane, Wellington FL 33414. Our display will be up through January 1st from 6PM - 11PM nightly.
Have a Safe, Healthy and Happy Holiday Season.
Merry Christmas,
The Martino Family

11106 150th Ct N, Jupiter, FL 33478.title: Pig Farm Christmas Light Show
11106 150th Ct N, Jupiter, FL 33478.description: The show is on a loop. Tune to 97.1 FM or listen on outdoor speakers. I start up the show at 5:30pm it runs through all the song sequences in the loop and starts over again throughout the whole time. It runs this loop until 9:30pm, 10pm if someone is still watching the show.

15944 84th Ave N, Palm Beach Gardens Pal.title: Country Roads Christmas Light Show
15944 84th Ave N, Palm Beach Gardens Pal.description:
🎄🎅🏻 It’s finally time! We are
LIVE from 11/27 until 12/31. Here is a very helpful FAQ:
💚 DAILY shows at promptly 6:30, 7:30,
8:30pm. They last for approx. 20min each.
❤️ We are located at 15944 84th Ave
North in Palm Beach Gardens.
💚 Each show is different! We rotate
50 different songs among the different times
(some Christmas, some not).
It “snows” following EVERY show along
the 159th (dirt road side).
❤️ Bring your child’s letter to Santa to
put in the mailbox! We have a mailbox
out on the dirt road side (159th)
by the gate. Feel free to put your letters
in there and we will make sure Santa gets them!
💚 This is not a walk-thru type of display.
We recommend parking on the side of the road, viewing from the fence
or tuning your car radio to 100.9FM. We recommend
arriving a little early to secure a spot.
❤️ The best spot to view the show is on the dirt
road side (159th). It’s the best angle. Park and get out!
PLEASE WATCH THE DRAINAGE AREAS THAT ARE FENCED OFF!
💚 If it is pouring down rain, we may not have shows
in order to protect our equipment. We will post if this happens.
❤️ Santa, food trucks & the Grinch visit a few times
before Christmas. We will post 24 hours before any events are planned!
💚 We have some really awesome neighbors. They are
amazing and supportive, so please be courteous to our property
and our neighbors so we can keep this going each year!
Please don’t leave any garbage on the ground, and do not
block anyone's driveway.
Merry Christmas!! 🎅🏻. Key dates: ‚ù§Ô∏è Saturday, November 29 - hot chocolate stand, Nanas Pumpkin Bread and our first night of the Little Smiles, Inc. toy drive! (Please bring a new unwrapped toy to put in the donation box)
Friday, December 5 - Santa‚Äôs arrival night! Meat in the Middle Food Truck and The Scoop Coop will be on site alongside SANTA. Toy drive will be open.
Saturday, December 13 - hot chocolate stand and last night of the toy drive in the igloo.
Friday, December 19 - Meat In The Middle & The Scoop Coop on site with SANTA üéÖüèª
~ Kristen & Sean ~
Sponsored by Curly Tail Screen & Window, LLC

Heights Blvd, Jupiter, FL 33458.title: Heights of Jupiter
Heights Blvd, Jupiter, FL 33458.description: The Heights is a pizza slice shaped neighborhood of 1,500 single family ranch and two story homes in Jupiter, Florida. The official name is North Palm Beach Heights but most people just call it the Heights. The Heights is located off of Donald Ross Road and is between I-95 and Abacoa. The Heights neighborhood really loves Christmas and Florida Power and Light really loves the Heights. Every December the Heights shows their love of the holidays by decking out their homes with lights, inflatables, and all kinds of decorations. Some of the highlights are the lighted arches that stretch over the street and street nicknamed Candy Cane Lane because every house on the street is lined with colorful candy canes. My favorite decorations included the robotic arm sleigh flying the rooftop, tropical Santa taking a break from the Christmas madness by lounging out on his beach chair, the lighted flamingos which is so Florida, and all of the Star Wars inflatables because you can't confine Christmas to just this galaxy. Be sure not to miss Hollywood and Pompano Streets.

6342 Ungerer St Jupiter, FL 33458.title: Who-Ville Experience Jupiter
6342 Ungerer St Jupiter, FL 33458.description: Who-ville Experience is a unique entertainment destination in Jupiter, FL that offers immersive and interactive experiences for visitors of all ages. With a focus on creativity and imagination, Who-ville Experience provides a whimsical environment where guests can explore, play, and make memories together.
